body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, 4K+2K Dual Dash Cam, Free 64GB SD Card, 170° Wide Angle Dashboard Camera Recorder, Built-in Wi-Fi, GPS, Sony Night Vision, Motion Detection, 24H Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs 18 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 18 mins
features: 【4K+2K Top Rated Dash Camera】Dashcam Front and Rear Camera equipped with SONY IMX 335 sensor, 2160P HD front camera and 1440P IP68 waterproof rear camera can clearly capture license plates and road signs, 170 degrees + 140 degrees wide-angle suspected head can be clearly recorded in front and rear side of the car events, to provide protection for your trip!

【Dash Cam with APP】 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi brings more efficient and faster transmission speeds, using WiFi to link to our free Roadcam app, you can access your videos/albums, manage some of the in-vehicle camera settings, download and share your captured content directly on the app.

【Dash Cam with Parking Mode】 4 parking monitor modes, including motion detection, collision detection, combined motion and collision detection modes, and low bit rate modes, additional hardwire kit is required to realize this parking mode function (not included in the package), which can flexibly satisfy your monitoring needs in different situations to realize all-weather monitoring.

【Loop Recording and G Sensor】 When the SD card storage is full, the car dashcam will automatically overwrite the oldest unlocked video to realize loop recording, and the G Sensor can be used to lock the video in the event of a collision during driving or parking, and the video won't be overwritten, preserving important evidence for you.

【Excellent Performance] The camera for cars with a 64GB SD card and can support up to 256GB SD card, while this dash cams for cars is heat resistant and works in temperatures of 14°F-158°F (-10°C - 70°C), with the high heat-resistant chipset and adhesive pads, it can work normally no matter in the hot area or in the extreme cold zone.

【PROFESSIONAL AFTER-SALES SERVICE】 We provide 12 months warranty, full refund service within 30 days, and are equipped with round-the-clock professional after-sales service staff. If you have any problems when using our car recorder, you can contact us by email. We will reply to you within 24 hours to provide you with satisfactory service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4K/2K Dash Cam Helps You Embark on Your Driving Journey Car recorder provides all-round protection for your car's high-end and supports up to 256GB SD card. Please press the power button to turn on night vision mode, auto on/off, AU. no battery, built-in super capacitor (only use 1 mAh lithium metal battery storage time). Please always connect the external power supply when the car recorder is in use, the output current must reach 2A. Dash Cam Front and Rear Tip: Suction cup/sticker mounting is available for trucks or other vehicles with vertical windshields.Car cameras - front and rear dash cams provided (windshield stickers) Easy to apply, peel and transfer windshield stickers between cars, no adhesive residue, no solvents or scratches needed to remove stickers and avoid damaging the glass.Please note that we recommend using a companion SD card for best performance. Using a third party SD card may affect the performance of the CarLog and in some cases cause the CarLog to randomly reboot during recording. Please ensure that you format the SD card the first time you use the CarLog.

HD Dual Car Recorder Front and Interior The Car Recorder is equipped with two high quality cameras, the front camera can record 4K (3840*2160P) UHD video to capture a super clear view of the front of the car. The rear camera can record 1440P HD video to clearly capture license plates and road signs. Front camera: 3840x2160P/30FPS Rear camera: 2560PX1440P/120FPS. The HD camera makes this car recorder provide you with good driving protection.

with Built-in WiFi GPS Car recorder in order to more convenient driving travel in the appearance of the function are excellent design. Choose a high quality and beautiful and practical gift for the people around you. 24 Hours, Night Vision, Loop Recording helps you better preserve evidence when you encounter an accident. WiFi function: The Wi-Fi range is 3 m away from the dash cam. Zamufo a dash cam is not a cloud dash cam that all dash cams work like this, you can watch your videos no more than 10 feet away from your car. For Apple iOS Phone: Connect to the app via WiFi, open the RoadCam app to check real-time video → click on this iOS system input prompt → set wireless data to WiFi and turn off mobile data directly.

Super Night Vision The WDR technology adopted by the dual dash cam can achieve special results. Both light and very dark scenes can be seen very clearly at the same time. Screen Comparison The car recorder with 4K can see the picture in the video very clearly, and you have the right to choose a recorder that can meet your needs more clearly. What You Get Car charger with USB-C (3.5 m)ZAMOFU 4K Dual Dash CamGPS suction cup holderUSB C data cableInstruction manual (English）

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install and good camera
reviews.reviewText: The installation was simple and easy. The wire is long enough to take it through the door weatherstrip and hide it. The quality of video is decent. The mount that comes with it has been strong in 95F summer weather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dash Camera delivers outstanding video quality, capturing every detail on the road with clarity. Its compact design seamlessly integrates into your vehicle, while the user-friendly interface ensures effortless operation. With reliable performance and essential features, it's a must-have for enhanced safety and peace of mind. I just love its definitely worth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it!!!
reviews.reviewText: So far works fine, the video quality is ok. I like that has the option to connect a rear camera I didn't tested the option. its easy to install. The only bummer is that doesn't come with a micro SD card you need to buy separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this dash cam for a week. The night vision camera provides high-quality video and vision, capturing every detail on the road with clarity. Its compact design integrates seamlessly into the vehicle and its user-friendly interface makes operation simple. This camera is essential for increased safety and peace of mind, making it a must-have for drivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My very first Dash Cam!!
reviews.reviewText: I never had a dash cam before so investing in this was a must have! I was skeptical at first because I was not sure on how to use it, but it came with instructions but wasn’t too difficult to figure out. One thing to know is that is does not come with a SD card, luckily I had a spare one. Overall it gets the job done and records when I need it too, whether it’s driving or for parking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, great camera. Will definitely serve its purpose give me piece of mind while driving, knowing everything is recorded

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Dash CAM is not as described. Very misleading.
reviews.reviewText: The product is described as having a built in GPS. IT DOES NOT! You will receive an external GPS that must to be connected to the camera, however, there is not a port on the camera to plug into the GPS into. So there is no GPS capabilities what so ever.Do yourself a favor and look at other dash cams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Compact so not a distraction while driving. Video is clear.

reviews.reviewTitle: デジタルミラーとして申し分ない
reviews.reviewText: ドラレコとして購入しましたが、デジタルミラーとして見やすく重宝しています。妻の車に取り付けましたが、自分の車にも欲しくなりました。

reviews.reviewTitle: コスパとサイズがいい！
reviews.reviewText: 過去にフロントカメラ一体型を3台取付けて、4台目として前後カメラ完全分離式、Type-C電源、という事で購入しました。前後カメラの映像も綺麗に映ってます。フロントカメラ分離式なので、サンバイザーなど干渉しませんでした。ただ、日ざしのある晴天時にはミラーが反射してとても見にくいと感じました。サポートに反射防止フィルムをお願いしました。

reviews.reviewTitle: 初めてのデジタルミラードラレコ
reviews.reviewText: 画質もよく外観もスタイリッシュで良い感じです。あとは耐久性ですかね。
簡単に取り付けられて、リアもフロントもしっかり見えます。

reviews.reviewTitle: コスパよし、映像きれい
reviews.reviewText: 3日前に注文、本日午前中に届きました。直ぐに動作チェックを行い、ホンダインサイトZE4に取り付けました。電源取りは、シガーソケットからだと見た目が悪いため降圧ケーブルを使用しました。24時間駐車監視はバッテリー上がりが懸念されるため不要と思い、常時電源未接続でACC電源のみ接続しましたが起動しませんでした。ヒューズ等確認しましたが原因が分からず、念のため常時電源を接続したら起動しました。取説を確認したら、設定で24時間駐車監視OFFできることが分かりOFFにしました。また、リアカメラは商品説明、付属品に取付け金具が無かったため、別途リアカメラステーを購入しましたが、実際は取付け金具が付属されていたので不要でした。ですので、商品説明、付属品に取付け金具を載せて欲しいです。電源接続は少々時間が掛かりましたが、配線はスムーズ出来て試乗ました。映像はとても綺麗ですが、リアから日差しや明暗の変化で映り込み等で見えづらくなります。夜間走行はまだ行っていませんので分かりませんが、他の方の評価で、反射防止フィルムが有るとのことでお願いしています。届き次第、取り付け確認したいと思います。
